name: Spider
effect: Spider can block as though it had flying.

name: Warlock
effect: ⤵, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card. Target opponent loses 1 life.

name: Magi
effect: When Magi enters the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Skin-Walker
effect: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay 1 life. If you do, Skin-Walker gains unblockable until end of turn.

name: Fairy
effect: Flying

name: Wolf
effect: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another creature.

name: Ghoul
effect: Sacrifice a permanent: Return Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

name: Eagle
effect: Flying

name: Goblin
effect: Goblin gets +1/+1 for each other Red permanent you control.

name: Orc
effect: As long as Orc is equipped, it gets +2/+2

name: Griffin
effect: Flying

name: Kraken
effect: When Kraken attacks, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

name: Hydra
effect: When Hydra dies, create two 1/1 Hydra Head creature tokens

name: Elf
effect: ⤵: Put a creature card from your hand on to the battlefield tapped.

name: Dwarf
effect: Dwarf gets +1/+1 for each other Red permanent you control.  Sacrifice a red permanent: Deal 1 damage to any target.

name: Ogre
effect: When Ogre enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Giant
effect: You may discard Giant from your hand. When you do, deal 2 damage to target creature.

name: Oni
effect: Flying, When Oni dies, create a 1/1 Wisp creature token with flying.

name: Dragon
effect: Flying, RR permanent you control: Dragon gets +1/+1

name: Wizard
effect: Flying, When Wizard enters the battlefield, draw a card. T: Deal 1 damage to any target.

name: Phoenix
effect: Flying, You may cast Phoenix from your graveyard.

name: Demon
effect: When Demon enters the battlefield, search your deck for a card, then put that card on top of your deck.
